system.description: When you or an ally is Staggered for the first time in Violence, you or they immediately heal 1/4 of their max HP. This can only trigger once per ally per Violence (a fighter cannot benefit from Reflexive Elixir twice).
system.flavor: All magical effects are just a matter of the correct combination of herbs, knowledge of the soul, and twisting of your own ghost. As a master healer, use this to your advantage, and channel Sri Dewa Sarripada Agas.
